entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14

Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43483 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #327

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Removal of hasDebuggingEnabled function in 8.0.10 #108863
  • WASM tests failing with `Chrome failed to start` #108859
  • AssemblyLoadContext and Entity Framework DBContext - Cannot Unload #108858
  • [mono] Optimize "constant_string".Length #108857
    10.0.0
  • Swift interop: `TestSelfIsFrozenNonEnregisteredStructWithExtraArgs` fails on Mono #108855
  • win/x86: Assertion failed '!fgRngChkThrowAdded' during 'Calculate stack level slots' #108851
  • linux/arm: Assertion failed 'kind == Overwrite' during 'VN-based dead store removal' #108850
  • FileSystemWatcher does not report moved files #108840
  • Windows SDK tools do not support working with heavy portable symbols files. #108833
  • [Apple][x64] `System.Tests.StringTests.EndsWithNoMatch_StringComparison` test failure #108832
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_64208/Runtime_64208/Runtime_64208.cmd #108830
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/transitions/transitions/transitions.cmd #108829
    10.0.0
  • build error: comparison of different enumeration types #108827

Closed

  • Intermittent "IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error" #108710
  • runtimeconfig.json does not work with Single File App #108814
  • ILC crash in CI - NullReferenceException in XPath while processing substitution XML #108743
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra] CoreCLR CI job cannot pull fedora-39-helix image #107455
  • Base64Url.Try* should not throw #108834
  • Difference in Windows and Linux platform for short date format "t", for culture code "zh-CN" (Chinese - People's Republic of China) #108845
  • Connection strings stored in K8s CSI Volumes are not resolved during function discovery #108793
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_64208/Runtime_64208/Runtime_64208.cmd #108828
  • [Apple][x64] EndsWithNoMatch_StringComparison test failure #108747
  • [System.Text.Json] Consider removing `RequiresUnreferenceCode`/`RequiresDynamicCode` annotations from certain `JsonSerializer` APIs #108781
    10.0.0
  • HttpStress, HTTP/3: content mismatch in POST Duplex Slow #76183
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #108862
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.11
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #108861
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.36
  • [release/9.0] Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108856
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Port NuGet Audit back to 9.0 #108854
    needs-area-label
  • Remove logic around checking for and determining NGEN paths from dac-dbi interface #108853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Fix folding of GC pointer arithmetic in lowering #108838
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move IsDebuggerPresent to minipal, convert to QCall #108837
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Produce correctly typed IR in TLS helper expansion #108836
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use default timeout of 30s. #108835
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Remove managed EH code frames from stack trace #108831
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Reduce net core app current package dependencies, increase direct update availability #108797
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • JIT: very simple cloning heuristic #108771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink: Don't mark attributes from MarkEntireType #108552
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix PKCS#12 to use SHA1 MAC #108825
    area-System.Security
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108765
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • [release/9.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108766
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix optimization of Vector512 AndMask + NotMask to AndNotMask #108803
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable all configurations inner loop #108848
    needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108495
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108714
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108805
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Make cDAC delegate to the DAC instead of the other way around #108772
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Rename `WasmBuildTests` settings to the names of properties they impact #108780
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Use llvm 19.1.0 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 129.0.6668.100, windows: 130.0.6723.44 #108816
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Fix CET debugger stepping over CALL instructions #108809
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • unblock cloning of loops where the header is a try begin #108604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2560380 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid `OverflowException` in `Boolean.TryFormat` #108572
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Crossgen2 outer loop fixes #108819
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106220
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't call EnsureInstanceActive under StaticBoxInitLock #108736
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Use the cross-amd64 image #102069
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-5:Add loongarch support in some files for LoongArch64 #103398
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-4:Add exception handling module for LoongArch64 #103397
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-3:Add method trampolines module for LoongArch64 #103396
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-2:Add instruction selection module for LoongA… #103395
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-1:Add native code emission module for LoongArch64 #103403
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Mitigate first-class Span breaks #108789
    area-codeflow
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add tracking markdown. #2716
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetVersion (#108704) #2715

Merged

  • Interpreter supports `UnmanagedCallersOnly` marked methods. #2712
  • Fix unwinding for StubLink #2713

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement stack traces on WASI via precise virtual unwinding #2697
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use NuGet API's for packages #44169
  • Customer using userlocal maui install unable to find maui workloads #44165
  • PublishContainer with an invalid ContainerBaseImage does not fail the build. #44164
  • Missing NETSDK1206 warning #44163
  • The framework [.../onnxruntime.framework] is a framework of static libraries, and will not be copied to the app #44161
  • Autocreate of ~/.aspnet/https is broken #44157
  • CS8785 error after updating from 8.0.304 to 8.0.306 SDK #44145

Closed

  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 GA creating 8.0/6.0 project requires November Servicing (8.0.11/6.0.36) feeds. #44142
  • Can't download 8.0.403 SDK from official website #44144

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44170
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Update Microsoft.NET.Sdk.StaticWebAssets.JSModules.targets #44160
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fine tune first join point and VMR support for it #44153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • .NET 9 RC 2, MAUI baseline manifests #44162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch back to 17.8.3 for the minimum msbuild version #43995
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.11
  • Pass official build id props via /p: #43520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Execute GetTestsProject msbuild task if IsTestApplication property is true #44158
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix assembly version diff test for missing file #44156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update bootstrap arcade #44086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move log dirs under repo-projects and rename them #44149
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Use PortableRid config value for self-contained publish test #43244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add extra properties for test results in dotnet test #44109
    Area-DotNet Test

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2560443 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove a extra item line #44084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suggestion: warn on use of "not A or B" pattern matching syntax #75506
  • Consider not using the obsolete ServicePointManager #75499
  • MSBuild.UnitTests should target `$(NetRoslyn)` instead of `$(NetVS)` #75498
  • Found conflicts between different versions of libraries for the project under .NET Framework 4.7.2 #75497

Closed

  • Migrate the target framework in our builds #75453
    17.13
  • remove `net7.0` target #75205
  • "Field is never assigned" warning inconsistent for ref fields #75315
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Warn instead of crashing if we get a request with unknown language #75509
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #75504
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Run BinSkim once on artifacts #75502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mention `Enumerable.Reverse` breaking change #75501
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Move `#if NET` directives forward #75500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix symbol package name #75508
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [release/dev17.8] Merge from internal 17.8 #75468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exclude two manually zipped servicehub symbol nupkgs from being signed #75505
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Test case for analyzer dependency loading #75487
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not pin the Compilers.Toolset version #75488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add --sign switch on non-windows platforms #75491
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update to net9.0 #75465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unify collection expression cycle handling #75464
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix reporting of MSBuild warnings in MSBuildWorkspace #75183
    Area-IDE, Community, IDE-MSBuildWorkspace, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring #58427
  • Perf improvement: caching #58426
  • [PERF] Lighthouse benchmarks failing #58424
  • When build an ASP.NET Web App, throw "The input string '0/001838235294' was not in a correct format.'" exception! #58422
  • [Blazor] Behavioral breaking change in .NET 8.0 component re-rendering #58417
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Routing system should introduce some abstraction for converting route parameters to strings. #58416
    Backlog
  • We are having trouble with both `0.0.0.0` and `0.0.0.1` with [Stripe Elements UI](https://docs.stripe.com/payments/payment-element) for collecting payment card details. #58415
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] InputBase - failed parsing (eg. InputNumber) triggers field validation #58407
    .NET 10 Planning
  • IOpenApiDocumentTransformer cannot modify components.Schemas since it's null #58406
  • Perf regression: json #58405
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext, updates #58404
  • Application fails to start when setting custom ApplicationName #58403

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #58398
  • Regression in .NET 9-RC2: FileLoadException in Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server with Swashbuckle #58379
  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring #58387
  • HybridCache behind a load balancer and multi node environments #58402
  • After using services.AddHttpLogging(), the ResponseBody cannot be passed to Serilog for file logging. #58381

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Winforms reference #58431
    area-infrastructure
  • Skip H2Spec 6.9.2/2 #58430
    area-networking
  • Remove bulk disables of CA warnings #58428
    area-networking
  • Update global.json to 10.0 sdk #58425
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24513.10 #58409
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • ArcadeBuildFromSource -> DotNetBuildSourceOnly #58423
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Add retry for test Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore.Test.ProtectedUserStoreTest.PhoneFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #58232
    pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove dead code and clean up multisz/a and stringa #58373
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling for inert route parameters in MVC endpoints for OpenAPI #58311
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor
  • [release/9.0] Fix ModelMetadata for TryParse-parameters in ApiExplorer #58372
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Unquarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #58368
    area-networking
  • Parse enum unions in config #58328
    area-networking
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #58364
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML Page Binding to Self Gets Incorrect Warning #25271
  • Ellipse get distorted when scaled down on Android 7 and lower #25270
  • Fix safe area arrange issue with MauiView #25266
    Backlog
  • MeasureInvalidated events are now fired too often #25264
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [GB18030][MAUI] Some codes in the xaml and xaml.cs begin with an underscore after adding xaml with a test string as the file name #25262
  • clean suceeded, build failed #25261
    Backlog
  • Unable to add localization for .NET MAUI app in VS Code on macOS #25260
  • Proposed Enhancements to UI Testing Documentation #25258
  • ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY does not reset when ItemsSource changes #25256
  • Text Disappearing on Reducing Scale in .NET MAUI SfImageEditor #25249
  • [TitleBar] Fix commented out TitleBar style #25248
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • In iphone 16 (ios 18) Splash screen showing black #25246
  • TitleBar visual state typo #25245
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • In Iphone13 (ios 15.0) version button click events not working fine in iphone 16 working fine #25244
  • TitleBar API doc mistake #25238
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working on iOS from maui 8.0.80 and onward #25237
  • Custom controls for complex type properties must be wrapped with layout to work #25236

Closed

  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Debugger crashes the app on Windows almost immediately in debug configuration #24293
    .NET 9.0 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Match Catalyst Template to iOS for Shell Flyout Items #25269
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Re-enable tests #25268
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Merge sr9 into net9 ga #25265
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix tsa file not found #25255
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #25254
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 #25252
  • [housekeeping] Move from term "laid out" to "arranged" #25250
  • [Documentation] Fix TitleBar comment mistake #25243
    area-docs
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures

Merged

  • Preview Branding for SR10 #25267
    .NET 8 SR10
  • [Testing] Navigate directly to control tests #25242
    area-testing
  • [iOS]Resolved Button Text Resets to Previous Value When Set to Empty String Programmatically. #25171
    community ✨
  • [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25151
    fixed-in-net9.0-nightly
  • Release Branding for .NET 8 SR9.2 #25263
  • Add RC2 to Issue Template #25253
    fixed-in-net8.0-nightly
  • [housekeeping] Fix ps1 script warnings #25241
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly
  • [housekeeping] Remove debug.keystore #25240
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly
  • [Testing] Add UITest Stepper actions #25130
    area-testing, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly

Updated

  • [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25184
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR10
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR10
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Support improved VS component IDs #25205
  • [Windows] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Adding items to windows ObservableItemTemplateCollection #24777
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException when setting BarBackgroundColor for a NavigationPage - fix #25197
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, potential-regression
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing

    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Swipe view improvements #25233
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096
    do-not-merge
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129

  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004

  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    community ✨
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305

  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 9 rc1 - sql server - Problem with type mapping during linq to sqlexpression translation #34900

Closed

  • Problem using DefaultAzureCredential() with Cosmos EF -- More than twenty 'IServiceProvider' instances have been created. #34889
  • OrderBy discarded when followed by Distinct in 3.x but not 2.x #19130
  • User parameter data is referenced inside RelationalCommandCache #34028
  • Implement DatePart nanosecond #13481
    10.0.0
  • SDK 8.0.403 not compatible with dotnet-ef #34871
  • Scaffolding against Azure Data Explorer with SQL Server emulation doesn't work #34833
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34910
  • [release/9.0] branding for GA - enable stable branding #34909
  • Use matching type mapping when translating `BoolSwitch` #34906
  • Rewrite SearchConditionConverter #34905
  • Fix to #34895 - Final GroupBy on an entity type adds orderings for all of its properties #34896

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34908
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34887
  • [release/9.0] Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34907
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Nanoseconds and microseconds processing fix on Cosmos #34901
    Servicing-approved
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.43.1 to 3.44.0 #34904
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 8.0.8 to 8.0.10 #34903
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34803
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34902
  • [release/9.0] Don't break transactions across batches #34869
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Avoid infinite recursion on identifying shadow FKs #34891
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Avoid infinite recursion on identifying shadow FKs #34892
    Servicing-approved
  • Add implementation for Nanoseconds and Microseconds for DateTime[Offset], TimeSpan, {Date|Time}Only. #34861
  • Make SQL Server scaffolding compatible with Azure Data Explorer #34832
  • [release/9.0] Fix to #34760 - NullReferenceException for a custom ValueConverter in EF Core 9 RC 1. #34894
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34890
